FP Complete - Remote position - San Francisco - Test Engineers

Software Engineer in Test https://www.fpcomplete.com/business/software-engineer-test/ For this role we are looking for someone to help build our test and delivery capabilities. You will be working as a member of the development team providing direct input and support on product implementation, testing, and quality. Your mission is to innovate on the test infrastructure enabling and implementing automated tests and test suites across multiple product component.

Test Engineer (Software) https://www.fpcomplete.com/business/test-engineer-software/ For this position we are looking for creative software test engineers to work on our commercial SaaS product. You will be working as a member of the product team and you will be expected to provide direct input on product implementation, testing, and quality. Your mission is to represent the customer. You will learn the system from top to bottom validating the product and making sure it delivers what the customer needs.
